meanings.definition: The primordial substance from which the universe was formed.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study the ylem to understand how everything began.
meanings.sent2: The ylem is believed to contain the building blocks of the cosmos.
meanings.sent3: The ylem decided to throw a big cosmic party and create galaxies.
meanings.sent4: In the vast ylem of space, new stars are born every day.
meanings.sent5: Imagine the ylem as a giant cosmic soup brewing the universe.

meanings.definition: The original matter from which all elements were created.
meanings.sent1: Ancient myths often mention the ylem as the source of all things.
meanings.sent2: Chemists study the ylem to understand the origins of different elements.
meanings.sent3: The ylem was feeling proud of being the ancestor of all matter.
meanings.sent4: In the alchemist's tale, the ylem transformed into gold, symbolizing creation.
meanings.sent5: The ylem holds the secrets of the universe within its ancient core.
